name: Recycle Quest
description:
This is an uncanny bullet hell shooter in which you play as a "Recycle Bin Currently Possessed by a Ghost™", using your awesome shooting game skills and luck to take on screen-filling bullet fights against a cast of weird and colorful bosses and stages!

There are 5 stages across 4 difficulties of pure bullet spam in total, plus a sixth stage acessible only to those who prove themselves skilled enough to clear the game without using "continues"! Are you up to the challenge?!

This game takes heavy inspiration from the Touhou Project games (this was even planned to be a Touhou fangame at one point in fact), so this should be quite easy to those already familiar with that series!

CONTROLS
  • Arrow keys: Move
  • Z: Shoot | Menu "confirm"
  • X: Bomb | Menu "back"
  • Shift: Focus (slow movement)
  • Esc: Pause
